title: Subpart 70-5 - Approval Of Alternative Treatment Technologies For Use In New York State
content:
Subpart 70-5 - Approval Of Alternative Treatment Technologies For Use In New York State

State Regulations
§ 70-5.1 - Treatment technology approval
§ 70-5.2 - Limitations and voiding of approval

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
